panels.content:
# Rancher Statistics

This dashboard exports metrics from within the rancher server container its-self. This is done through modifying the `graphite.host` value in the rancher API. This is for now a manual step and requires a restart of the rancher server container to take affect. Instructions on how to do this can be found [here](https://github.com/infinityworksltd/Guide_Rancher_Monitoring).

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "jvm.os.SystemLoadAverage" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jvm.runtime.Uptime" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jvm.memory.HeapMemoryUsage.used" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jvm.memory.HeapMemoryUsage.committed" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jvm.gc.MarkSweepCompact.CollectionCount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "metric.event.failed.event_failed_agent_request.Count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "metric.event.failed.event_failed_ping.Count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT median("value") FROM "metric.event.failed.event_failed_ping.Count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "metric.event.publish.event_publish_ping_reply.Count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "metric.event.request.event_request_ping.Count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "thread_pool.process.RejectedExecutionCount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "thread_pool.process.ActiveCount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "metric.process_server.process_execution_resource_busy.Count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "database.MaxActive" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "database.NumActive" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "database.NumIdle" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "thread_pool.core.ActiveCount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "thread_pool.core.RejectedExecutionCount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "thread_pool.process.ActiveCount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jvm.thread.ThreadCount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "thread_pool.process.RejectedExecutionCount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jvm.thread.ThreadCount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "jvm.os.OpenFileDescriptorCount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "metric.process_server.process_execution_timeout.Count" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "metric.event.time.event_time_ping.Mean" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
